SEARCH
Package com.revature.Revagenda.controllers

Class TaskController

java.lang.Object
com.revature.Revagenda.controllers.TaskController
@RestController public class TaskController extends Object
This controller handles task associated requests, exposing CRUD functionality to complete workflows such as saving or retrieving tasks.

  • Constructor Details

    • TaskController

  • Method Details

    • createNewTask

      @PostMapping(path="/users/{username}/tasks") public com.revature.Revagenda.entities.Task createNewTask(@PathVariable String username, @RequestBody com.revature.Revagenda.entities.Task task) throws com.revature.Revagenda.exceptions.NoResultsException
      This method exposes create functionality on Task items, persisting them in the database. Username is used to identify the user who owns the task.
      Parameters:
      username - - String representing the unique username
      task - - Task object to be saved
      Returns:
      - Task object with auto-generated keys and other references in place
      Throws:
      com.revature.Revagenda.exceptions.NoResultsException - when the username isn't matched in the database

    • getTasksForUserByCompletionStatus

      @GetMapping(path="/users/{username}/tasks") public List<com.revature.Revagenda.entities.Task> getTasksForUserByCompletionStatus(@PathVariable String username, @RequestParam String complete) throws com.revature.Revagenda.exceptions.NoResultsException
      This method queries the database for tasks belonging to a specific user and allows client to filter tasks based on complete being true or false. Complete parameter should be included in the query list of the request.
      Parameters:
      username - - String identifying the user who owns the tasks
      complete - - boolean filter criteria for tasks
      Returns:
      a List of task items
      Throws:
      com.revature.Revagenda.exceptions.NoResultsException - when the username doesn't match any in the database
